column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////Okay so I'll tell you what you really want to know:  the food at Bavette's is AMAZING.  That may be a trite descriptor
column2: but trust me it's accurate.  I started with the Lillet Rose martini
column5: and lillet rose.  It was light
column6: fruity and refreshing - a positive start to the meal!
